snippet: An internal bulletin board on the Oscars Web site is allowing members of the documentary branch to recommend films to other votes, despite the general guidelines that prevent overt campaigning.
abstract: An internal bulletin board on the Oscars Web site is allowing members of the documentary branch to recommend films to other votes, despite the general guidelines that prevent overt campaigning.

headline.main: No Campaigning for Oscar Votes, but Please Add Recommendation Here
